name: Virtual Town
storyline: Oh no, the old Mayor of Virtual Town has left under mysterious circumstances! The town is at a loss. And what a mess he left! Move to Virtual Town and take the role of Mayor in this open-world simulation by Last Day of Work (creator of Virtual Families and Virtual Villagers). Bring the town back to its old glory! Hire a secretary, raise a child as your little helper and successor, meet all the interesting and quirky residents and help them in their quests. Grow food and keep the town fed. Restore and arrange the town to your liking. Add statues, fountains. Build a big garden. It's a living, breathing world, and it is full of surprises!
summary: Virtual Town is a little abandoned town right in your device! Come in and help out (they need it!).
